1.title: Nightmare Canyon Pt. 1
1.plot: Justin and Jeremy Harris' weekend decent into a remote Utah canyon becomes a survival nightmare when Justin severely breaks his leg. As night fast approaches and temperatures drop below freezing, how will these two brothers survive?

2.title: Nightmare Canyon Pt. 2
2.plot: Justin and Jeremy Harris' weekend decent into a remote Utah canyon becomes a survival nightmare when Justin severely breaks his leg. As night fast approaches and temperatures drop below freezing, how will these two brothers survive?

3.title: Lightning Strike
3.plot: A bass fishing trip goes horribly wrong when a bolt of lightning strikes their boat, leaving Seventeen-year-old Christian Neal burned and unconscious and his father Gabe blown into the water and paralyzed. It will take a miracle to save them.

4.title: Treestand Nightmare
4.plot: When avid bow hunter, Dr. Joe Baumgardner sets out to do routine maintenance on his tree stands, a twenty two foot fall leaves him with a severely broken leg and miles from help in the deep Mississippi woods.

5.title: Crushed by a Boulder Pt. 1
5.plot: While solo climbing Mt. Goddard, a remote peak in the California Sierra, Gregg Hein's leg is crushed by a boulder and he's sent careening down the mountain. Barely able to stop his fall, he's now faced with a horrific compound fracture.

6.title: Crushed by a Boulder Pt. 2
6.plot: After his leg is crushed by a boulder, Gregg Hein is stranded on a high Sierra peak with an infected compound fracture. Knowing he won't be reported missing for days, Gregg attempts to crawl off the mountain and rescue himself.

7.title: Iraqi Sniper Attack
7.plot: On deployment in Anbar Province, Marine Corp Master Sergeant Buck Doyle throws himself in harms way to save a fallen comrade from an Iraqi sniper and becomes a target himself.

8.title: Under the Desert Sun
8.plot: Ed Rosenthal set out for a short hike in Joshua Tree National Park, but in the heat of the day he became turned around and lost. His six-day ordeal of survival in blazing temperatures with no food or water is nothing short of miraculous.

9.title: Mountain Lion Attack
9.plot: Marine Anne Hjelle was mountain biking when she was ripped off her bike by a mountain lion. Anne fought back even as the big cat shredded her face in its jaws. Surviving the attack was only the beginning of Anne's incredible fight to survive.

10.title: Soul of a Survivor
10.plot: Craig DeMartino examines the stories of other survivors he's met across the season. Their survival stories are all different, but Craig discovers that these survivors share more in common than you might think.

1.title: After the Fall
1.plot: A rock-climbing disaster hurtles climber Craig DeMartino 100 feet down a granite cliff. A shattered heap of broken bones, Craig clings to life. In a split second, Craig's life becomes an inspiring fight to survive.

2.title: A River's Grasp
2.plot: In an isolated mountain river, Fisherman Dean Ririe becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder in water up to his neck. In icy waters that should kill a man, Dean fights for his life miles from help.

3.title: ATV Nightmare
3.plot: A father and son camping trip turns into a desperate fight to survive when John Sloot is crushed under an ATV. Now his 10 year-old son, Cody must brave the wilderness alone to get help.

4.title: Trapped in a Glacier
4.plot: While hiking alone deep in Glacier National Park, Ted Porter plummets into an icy glacial crevasse. With a broken back and miles from anyone, he must fight to survive.

5.title: Stranded in the Alaska Wilderness Part 1
5.plot: Hunters Adrian Knopps and Garrett Hagen venture into the remotest part of Alaska's Misty Fjord, hunting Moose and Bear. After a successful hunt Adrian finds himself trapped by a twenty foot tidal surge after Garrett fails to return with the skiff.

6.title: Stranded in the Alaska Wilderness Part 2
6.plot: After a successful hunt., Adrian Knopps' hunting partner disappears taking their bear out to the boat. Now Adrian finds himself stranded on a tidal flat surround by bears and wolf packs and with massive storm bearing down on him. How will he survive?

7.title: The Journal
7.plot: Pastor Mike Turner is on a solo hike across the continental divide in the unforgiving Wind Rivers Range of Wyoming when he becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder. He chronicles his grueling 11-day fight to survive in his own journal.

8.title: Tree Stand Fall
8.plot: Deer hunter Nathan Holcomb plummets from his tree stand. Every hunters' worst nightmare becomes Nathan's reality. With a broken back and paralyzed, Nathan must crawl out on his own to find help.

9.title: Adrift Part 1
9.plot: In what is regarded as one of greatest survival stories of the 20th Century, sailor Steven Callahan finds himself alone and adrift in a life raft after his boat, the Napoleon Solo sinks in the mid Atlantic.

10.title: Adrift Part 2
10.plot: Facing starvation, dehydration and predators from the deep, sailor Steven Callahan fights to survive not only the physical hardships, but also the mental and emotional strain of being adrift and alone in a disintegrating life raft.

imdb.plot outline: Fight to Survive tells the inspiring true stories of outdoorsmen who have faced down death in the wilderness and lived to tell their story. Adventurer, author and survivor Craig DeMartino hosts the series, journeying to meet other survivors and hear their stories. Each week, Craig takes a survivor back to the flashpoint of their ordeal as they share with him their very own fight to survive. This series takes the audience right into to some of the most majestic and dangerous places in North America. From the exciting action to the inspiring comebacks, these stories will remind us all that faith, determination and human spirit can do anything when faced with the ultimate Fight to Survive.
imdb.title: Fight to Survive
plot: _Fight to Survive_ (qv) tells the inspiring true stories of outdoorsmen who have faced down death in the wilderness and lived to tell their story. Adventurer, author and survivor Craig DeMartino hosts the series, journeying to meet other survivors and hear their stories. Each week, Craig takes a survivor back to the flashpoint of their ordeal as they share with him their very own fight to survive. This series takes the audience right into to some of the most majestic and dangerous places in North America. From the exciting action to the inspiring comebacks, these stories will remind us all that faith, determination and human spirit can do anything when faced with the ultimate _Fight to Survive_ (qv).
